name: Dragon Ball Z - Bulma's Wish
description:
Dragon Ball Z - Bulma's Wish is a FanGame based in the Dragon Ball Universe created by Akira Toriyama.

Cell, an evil bio android created by Dr. Gero, has been defeated by Son-Gohan and the world ist at peace again. His Father Son-Goku, who had rescued the Earth several times, died in the fight against Cell. He decides that he does not want to be brought back by the Dragon Balls. It would be better for everyone if he stayed in the Otherworld.

A year after the events of the Cell Games... .

A mysterious warrior from space ends up on planet Earth.
Why did he come to Earth?
What is his intention?
Is he good or evil?
Will he be a threat to the Z-Warriors?

Play Dragon Ball Z - Bulma's Wish to find out.

This game was created with the vanilla Steam Version of RPG Maker 2003.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game can be played with a XBox gamepad or keyboard.

Other controllers will be supported in the future.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you record or stream the gameplay shoot me a message with your VOD and/or link to the stream. I would love to check that out.
